data: OUR story opens in that broad, far-reaching expanse of water which lies deep and blue between the two hemispheres, some fifteen degrees north of the equator, in the latitude of Cuba and the Cape Verd Islands.
The Sea-Witch; Or, The African Quadroon: A Story of the Slave Coast
